Steps to use search.pl
1) set VCS_HOME ....
2) Run

	%perl $VCS_HOME/doc/examples/search.pl
	It will prompt you for a keyword to search the right example

3) This will result in a list of examples with their complete path.
4) Now you are prompted to do a "search within search"
5) Continue to further search and narrow down your results
   OR stop searching and choose to open the example of your interest.
